forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 11pm and 1am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 35. West northwest wind around 1 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 7am and 8am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 8am and 10am, then rain and snow showers likely between 10am and 4pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 39. Southwest wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
